frontmatter.title: Séminaire de Géométrie Algébrique du Bois-Marie

li.p: Directed by A. Grothendieck. Augmented with two exposés by Mme M. Raynaud. 1960–61. arXiv:math/0206203v2

link.title: SGA 6: Intersection theory and the Riemann–Roch theorem
link.strong: SGA 6: Intersection theory and the Riemann–Roch theorem

li.p: Directed by P. Berthelot, A. Grothendieck, and L. Illusie. With the collaboration of D. Ferrand, J.P. Jouanolou, O. Jussila, S. Kleiman, M. Raynaud, and J.P. Serre. 1966–67.
